name: Verdict

description.0: A weapon once used by a young maiden who forsook her family name, stained with the blood of enemies and loved ones both.

passiveName: Many Oaths of Dawn and Dusk

0.0: Increases ATK by <cryo>20%</cryo>. When party members obtain Elemental Shards from Crystallize reactions, the equipping character will gain 1 Seal, increasing Elemental Skill DMG by <cryo>18%</cryo>. The Seal lasts for 15s, and the equipper may have up to 2 Seals at once. All of the equipper's Seals will disappear 0.2s after their Elemental Skill deals DMG.
